description: Hit polynomials, coefficient of y^2 in N_n(y).
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
Earl Glen Whitehead, Jr., Four-discordant permutations, J. Austral. Math. Soc. Ser. A 28 (1979), no. 3, 369-377.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Dec 29 2015
